Uses of Package
io.permazen.kv.util

  • Packages that use io.permazen.kv.util 
    Package Description
    io.permazen.kv.array
    A simple KVStore implementation based on a sorted array of key/value pairs.
    io.permazen.kv.caching
    Caching KVStore and KVDatabase layers.
    io.permazen.kv.leveldb
    KVDatabase implementation based on LevelDB.
    io.permazen.kv.mvcc
    Utility classes for MVCC type operations using a KVStore.
    io.permazen.kv.raft.fallback
    A partition-tolerant KVDatabase that automatically migrates between a clustered RaftKVDatabase and a private non-clustered "standalone mode" KVDatabase, based on availability of the Raft cluster.
    io.permazen.kv.rocksdb
    KVDatabase implementation based on RocksDB.
    io.permazen.kv.spanner
    KVDatabase implementation based on Google Cloud Spanner.
    io.permazen.kv.sql
    KVDatabase implementations based on SQL connections.
    io.permazen.kv.util
    Utility classes relating to the KVDatabase interface.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.array 
    Class and Description
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.caching 
    Class and Description
    CloseableForwardingKVStore
    A ForwardingKVStore also implementing CloseableKVStore, with some associated underlying Closeable resource to close when CloseableForwardingKVStore.close()'d.
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.leveldb 
    Class and Description
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.mvcc

    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.raft.fallback 
    Class and Description
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.rocksdb 
    Class and Description
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.spanner 
    Class and Description
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.sql 
    Class and Description
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.util 
    Class and Description
    AbstractKVNavigableMap
    NavigableMap support superclass for maps backed by keys and values encoded as byte[] arrays in a KVStore, and whose key sort order is consistent with the byte[] key encoding.
    AbstractKVNavigableSet
    NavigableSet support superclass for sets backed by elements encoded as byte[] keys in a KVStore and whose sort order is consistent with their byte[] key encoding.
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
    KeyWatchTracker
    Utility class used to track key watches.
    NavigableMapKVStore
    Provides a KVStore view of an underlying NavigableMap<byte[], byte[]> whose keys are sorted lexicographically as unsigned bytes.
    PrefixKVDatabase
    Prefix KVDatabase implementation.
    PrefixKVStore
    A KVStore view of all keys having a common byte[] prefix in an outer, containing KVStore.
    PrefixKVTransaction
    KVTransaction view of all keys having a common byte[] prefix in a containing KVTransaction.
